pages.text: ShadowRaptor's Official Discord server is available for general questions or discussions about the modpack.$(br2)Please make sure to not go there for bug reporting; go to$(br)the $(l:https://github.com/zediious/galacticdrive/issues)issue tracker$() instead.
Click the button below to join the Discord server!.$(br2) $(br2)           ⇩ ⇩ ⇩
